home.title: WhytChat
home.shopDescription: Your support helps develop privacy-respecting tools.
home.shopCoffeeDesc: A small coffee for long development nights
home.shopHappinessDesc: A moment of joy and motivation
home.shopHopeDesc: Hope for a future where AI serves humanity
home.aboutPrivacyDesc: All your conversations stay on your computer. No data is sent online.
home.aboutLocalDesc: The AI runs directly on your machine using llama.cpp.
home.aboutModelsDesc: Download different AI models based on your needs (code, discussion, analysis).
home.aboutUsageDesc:
1. Create a new conversation
2. Choose a type (code, learning, etc.)
3. Chat with the AI privately
home.aboutShortcutsDesc:
Ctrl+N: New conversation
Ctrl+H: Home
Ctrl+L: Conversations list
Ctrl+/: Help
home.aboutDiscordDesc: Join our Discord server to chat, get help, and share your ideas.
home.aboutDonationDesc: WhytChat is developed by a solo developer. Your support helps improve the application.

conversationsList.title: My conversations
conversationsList.createFirst: Create your first conversation to start chatting with AI
conversationsList.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?

chat.title: Chat
chat.emptyState: Start a conversation by sending a message
chat.serverStarting: Starting AI server (this may take 5-10 seconds)...
chat.loadingModel: Loading AI model and starting server

importFile.title: Import File
importFile.description: Import a document to add context to the conversation. The AI will use this information to answer your questions.

llamaInstall.title: AI Engine Installation
llamaInstall.subtitle: Required for local AI generation
llamaInstall.description: WhytChat requires downloading the llama-server engine to generate AI responses locally on your computer.
llamaInstall.pleaseWait: Please wait, this may take a few minutes...

debug.title: Debug
debug.desc: View llama server logs and technical details.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.themeDesc: Switch between light and dark theme

about.title: About
about.description: Local AI chat application using the llama.cpp engine.

overlay.title: Overlay (gaming mode)
overlay.autoPassthroughDesc: When the mouse leaves the overlay, clicks pass to the game; on hover, clicks return to the overlay.
overlay.controlsIdleDesc: Idle delay before hiding opacity cursor and controls.
overlay.dragStripDesc: Displays a thin strip at the top to quickly move the window.
overlay.toggleKeyDesc: Press a key to register it (Escape to clear).
overlay.toggleKeyHelp: The registered key toggles the overlay when the app is in foreground.

welcome.title: Welcome to WhytChat
welcome.subtitle: An application by WhytCard
welcome.description: WhytChat is your local, privacy-focused AI assistant. All conversations stay on your device‚Äîno cloud, no tracking.

scan.title: System Performance Analysis
scan.consentText: To recommend the best model for your computer, we can perform a quick scan of your CPU and RAM. This analysis happens entirely on your device‚Äîno data is sent anywhere.
scan.errorMessage: Unable to scan system. You can still select a model manually.

result.title: Analysis Complete

tierSmall.title: üí° Lightweight System
tierSmall.description: Your computer has {{ram}}GB of RAM. We recommend lightweight models up to 4GB in size.

tierMedium.title: ‚ö° Balanced System
tierMedium.description: Your computer has {{ram}}GB of RAM. You can run medium-sized models (4-12GB) comfortably.

tierLarge.title: üöÄ Powerful System
tierLarge.description: Your computer has {{ram}}GB of RAM. You can run large models (12GB+) including 70B parameter models.

result.warningLowRam: ‚ö†Ô∏è With {{ram}}GB RAM, start with smaller models. Larger models may cause slowdowns.
result.intentQuestion: What will you primarily use AI for?
result.codingSmallTip: Lightweight models optimized for code completion and syntax help
result.codingMediumTip: Balanced models for full project assistance and debugging
result.codingLargeTip: Powerful models for complex refactoring and architecture
result.discussionSmallTip: Fast conversational models for quick questions
result.bothSmallTip: Versatile lightweight models for varied tasks

model.title: Select a Model
model.suggestion: Based on your system, I recommend:

conversation.title: Create Your First Conversation
conversation.helpText: WhytChat offers specialized templates for different tasks:
conversation.templateCoding: **Coding**: Optimized for programming and technical help
conversation.templateWriting: **Writing**: Helps with creative and professional writing
conversation.toneInfo: You can also adjust the tone (casual, professional, concise, etc.) to match your preference.
conversation.skipToCreate: You can customize these settings later when creating conversations.

external.title: Finding More Models
external.subtitle: WhytChat supports any GGUF format model. Here's where to find them:
external.sourceHuggingFace: **Hugging Face**: Largest model repository. Search for 'GGUF' in the model hub.
external.sourceBartowski: **Bartowski's Quantizations**: High-quality GGUF quantizations of popular models.
external.sourceTheBloke: **TheBloke (Archive)**: Historical collection of GGUF models (mostly pre-2024).
external.quantExplainer: **Quantization** (Q4, Q5, Q8): Lower numbers = smaller file but less accurate. Q4_K_M is a good balance.
external.sizeWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è **Important**: Check file sizes before downloading. A 70B Q4 model can be 40GB+. Make sure you have enough disk space and RAM.
external.importHelp: To use downloaded models: Go to **New Conversation** ‚Üí **Import Local Model** ‚Üí Select your `.gguf` file.

finish.title: You're All Set!
finish.subtitle: Ready to start chatting with your AI assistant.
finish.feature1: üîí 100% private ‚Äî everything stays on your device
finish.feature2: ‚ö° Fast responses ‚Äî no internet required after model download
finish.feature3: üé® Multiple templates ‚Äî coding, writing, learning, and more
finish.feature4: üìö RAG support ‚Äî import documents for context-aware answers
finish.tipText: Use Ctrl+N to quickly create new conversations from anywhere in the app.

promptTemplates.general: Act as a helpful assistant. Goal: {intent}. Be clear, concise, and ask for missing information before proceeding.
promptTemplates.coding: You are a senior software engineer. Goal: {intent}. Provide step-by-step reasoning, clean code, and explain trade-offs. No placeholders.
promptTemplates.writer: You are a professional writer. Goal: {intent}. Use a coherent structure, clear tone, and adapt to the audience.
promptTemplates.translator: You are a professional translator. Goal: {intent}. Preserve meaning and tone, ensure correctness. Provide only the translation.
promptTemplates.analyst: You are an analytical expert. Goal: {intent}. Provide a structured analysis, bullet points, and an actionable summary.

llama32_3b_light.label: Llama 3.2 3B - Light
llama32_3b_light.desc: Small and fast for general discussions, learning, and writing (4GB RAM)

mistral_balanced.label: Mistral 7B - Balanced
mistral_balanced.desc: Versatile for quality general discussions (6GB RAM)

llama31_8b_heavy.label: Llama 3.1 8B - Powerful
llama31_8b_heavy.desc: Robust model for complex discussions (8GB RAM)

qwen_coder_1.5b_light.label: Qwen Coder 1.5B - Light
qwen_coder_1.5b_light.desc: Fast for simple code and scripts (3GB RAM)

qwen_coder_fast.label: Qwen Coder 7B - Fast
qwen_coder_fast.desc: Optimized for development and coding (6GB RAM)

qwen_coder_14b_heavy.label: Qwen Coder 14B - Powerful
qwen_coder_14b_heavy.desc: Advanced model for complex projects (12GB RAM)

wizardlm_heavy.label: WizardLM 7B - Expert
wizardlm_heavy.desc: Expert model for advanced training (8GB RAM)

nous_hermes_balanced.label: Nous Hermes 7B - Creative
nous_hermes_balanced.desc: Optimized for writing and creativity (6GB RAM)

dolphin_heavy.label: Dolphin 7B - Writer
dolphin_heavy.desc: Specialized in long and nuanced writing (8GB RAM)

qwen25_7b_balanced.label: Qwen 2.5 7B - Balanced (2025)
qwen25_7b_balanced.desc: Latest Qwen model, excellent general performance with 32K context (6GB RAM)

qwen25_32b_heavy.label: Qwen 2.5 32B - Powerful (2025)
qwen25_32b_heavy.desc: Advanced 2025 model, exceptional reasoning and reduced hallucinations (20GB RAM)

llama33_70b_powerful.label: Llama 3.3 70B - Elite (2025)
llama33_70b_powerful.desc: Meta's flagship model, GPT-4 level performance, requires powerful hardware (48GB RAM)

mistral_small3_balanced.label: Mistral Small 3 24B - Pro (2025)
mistral_small3_balanced.desc: Mistral AI's latest balanced model, excellent for complex tasks (16GB RAM)

newConversation.title: New Conversation
newConversation.simpleModeIntro: Guided mode - Follow the 3 steps to create your conversation
newConversation.noModelsAvailable: No models available for this conversation type
newConversation.systemPromptHelp: Defines the AI's behavior and response style throughout this conversation
newConversation.downloadFirst: Please download the model before creating a conversation
newConversation.toneDescription: Customize the AI's communication style according to your preferences
newConversation.promptGeneral: You are a versatile AI assistant. Respond clearly, precisely and in a structured manner. Adapt your level of detail according to the complexity of the question. Cite your sources when relevant.
newConversation.promptCoding: You are a development assistant. Rigorously analyze code, propose optimized and secure solutions. Explain your technical choices and suggest best practices. Provide commented and tested code.
newConversation.promptLearning: You are an educator. Explain concepts progressively, from simple to complex. Use concrete analogies, practical examples and verify understanding before moving forward. Encourage questions.
newConversation.promptBrainstorm: You are a creative facilitator. Explore multiple angles of approach, propose diverse and original ideas. Question assumptions, combine concepts and help structure reflections.
newConversation.promptWriting: You are a writing assistant. Improve clarity, coherence and impact of texts. Respect the requested tone and style. Propose reformulations and identify argumentative weaknesses.
newConversation.promptAnalysis: You are a rigorous analyst. Synthesize information in a structured way, identify trends and inconsistencies. Present factual conclusions with their limitations. Prioritize verifiable data.

serverStatus.ready: AI server operational and ready to receive requests.
